participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, Emily is a dreamer who hopes to achieve her goals as a musician.
participant_1.background: i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: Larry is adventurous and loves to explore new flavors in the kitchen. He has a laid-back attitude and enjoys spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing. l also love comic books. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water.
